Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Toronto in 2009...
Traded from Toronto to Pittsburgh on 5/30/2009 (Going to PIT: CF J. Marisnick, 1B T. Jaynes. Going to TOR: P D. Storen, P A. Bastardo, LF W. Chou)...
Injured on 6/3/2009 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/24/2009 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/13/2011 with a Bruised Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 9/8/2013, off Tim Lincecum (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2014, off Mike Montgomery (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Washington on 9/6/2014...
Injured on 7/23/2015 with a Fractured Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 8/5/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/7/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $18,000,888 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Cleveland on 7/1/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/5/2019, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Cleveland on 9/3/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/5/2020, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2022, hitting .369 with 10 HR, 22 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/9/2023 to a 5-year deal worth $13,001,001 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 5/16/2023...
Injured on 6/21/2023 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2023, hitting .400 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 5/11/2024...
